verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H3187>households,<s%> and this is the genealogy of those who went <S%H5927>up<s%> with me from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> in the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4438>king:<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> <S%H1647>Gershom.<s%> Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel.<s%> Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H2407>Hattush.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shecaniah,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6551>Parosh,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah;<s%> and with him were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of the <S%H2145>males<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahathmoab,<s%> <S%H454>Eliehoenai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2228>Zerahiah;<s%> and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shecaniah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3166>Jahaziel;<s%> and with him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5720>Adin,<s%> <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3129>Jonathan;<s%> and with him <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6271>Athaliah;<s%> and with him <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael;<s%> and with him <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3171>Jehiel;<s%> and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8019>Shelomith,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3131>Josiphiah;<s%> and with him one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H893>Bebai,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H893>Bebai;<s%> and with him <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5803>Azgad,<s%> <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6997>Hakkatan;<s%> and with him one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H140>Adonikam,<s%> who were the <S%H314>last;<s%> and these are their <S%H8034>names:<s%> <S%H467>Eliphelet,<s%> <S%H3273>Jeuel,<s%> and <S%H8098>Shemaiah;<s%> and with them <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H902>Bigvai,<s%> <S%H5793>Uthai<s%> and <S%H2072>Zabbud;<s%> and with them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2145>males.<s%>

I gathered them <S%H6908>together<s%> to the <S%H5104>river<s%> that <S%H935>runs<s%> to <S%H163>Ahava;<s%> and there we <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> and I <S%H995>viewed<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> there none of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

Then <S%H7971>sent<s%> I for <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> for <S%H740>Ariel,<s%> for <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and for <S%H494>Elnathan,<s%> and for <S%H3402>Jarib,<s%> and for <S%H494>Elnathan,<s%> and for <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and for <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and for <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> chief <S%H7218>men;<s%> also for <S%H3114>Joiarib,<s%> and for <S%H494>Elnathan,<s%> who were <S%H995>teachers.<s%>

I <S%H6680>sent<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H112>Iddo<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3703>Casiphia;<s%> and I <S%H7760>told<s%> them <S%H1697>what<s%> they should <S%H7760>tell<s%> <S%H112>Iddo,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H5411>Nethinim,<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3703>Casiphia,<s%> that they should <S%H935>bring<s%> to us <S%H8334>ministers<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

According to the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> on us they <S%H935>brought<s%> us a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7922>discretion,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen;<s%>
and <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> and with him <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty;<s%>

and of the <S%H5411>Nethinim,<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5411>Nethinim:<s%> all of them were <S%H5344>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Then I <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast<s%> <S%H5104>there,<s%> at the river <S%H163>Ahava,<s%> that we might <S%H6031>humble<s%> ourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> of him a <S%H3477>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> for <S%H2945>us,<s%> and for our little ones, and for all our <S%H7399>substance.<s%>

For I was <S%H954>ashamed<s%> to <S%H7592>ask<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> a band of <S%H2428>soldiers<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> us against the <S%H341>enemy<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> because we had <S%H559>spoken<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> is on all those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H2896>him,<s%> for good; but his <S%H5797>power<s%> and his <S%H639>wrath<s%> is against all those who forsake <S%H5800>him.<s%>"
So we <S%H6684>fasted<s%> and <S%H1245>begged<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H6279>this:<s%> and he was entreated of us.

Then I set <S%H914>apart<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> of the <S%H8269>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> even <S%H8274>Sherebiah,<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> of their brothers with <S%H251>them,<s%>

and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> to them the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> even the <S%H8641>offering<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> which the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and his <S%H3289>counselors,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> there <S%H4672>present,<s%> had <S%H7311>offered:<s%>

I <S%H8254>weighed<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents;<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents;<s%>

and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3713>bowls<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H150>darics;<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2896>fine<s%> bright <S%H5178>brass,<s%> <S%H2532>precious<s%> as <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6944>them,<s%> "You are holy to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> are <S%H6944>holy;<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> are a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H8245>Watch,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H8254>them,<s%> until you weigh them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> in the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

So the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6901>received<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then we <S%H5265>departed<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H163>Ahava<s%> on the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> was on <S%H5337>us,<s%> and he delivered us from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and the <S%H693>bandit<s%> by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
We <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

On the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were <S%H8254>weighed<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and with him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas;<s%> and with them was <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and <S%H5129>Noadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1131>Binnui,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite;<s%>
the whole by <S%H4557>number<s%> and by <S%H4948>weight:<s%> and all the <S%H4948>weight<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> at that <S%H6256>time.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> who had come <S%H935>out<s%> of <S%H7628>exile,<s%> <S%H7126>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> male <S%H6842>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering:<s%> all this was a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1881>commissions<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H323>satraps,<s%> and to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>River:<s%> and they <S%H5375>furthered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
